meanings.definition: The strip of hair growing on the ridge above the eye.
meanings.sent1: Her thick eyebrow framed her face beautifully.
meanings.sent2: She plucked her eyebrow to shape it nicely.
meanings.sent3: The caterpillar crawled along her eyebrow, tickling her.
meanings.sent4: His eyebrow of doubt raised as he listened to the unbelievable story.
meanings.sent5: The eyebrow of the mountain loomed over the valley, casting a shadow.

meanings.definition: The arch or ridge forming the upper part of the orbit of the eye.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined the patient's eyebrow for any signs of swelling.
meanings.sent2: She raised her eyebrow in surprise at the unexpected news.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child drew a funny face on his sister's eyebrow while she slept.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was an eyebrow on the horizon, welcoming travelers.
meanings.sent5: The eyebrow of the bridge connected the two sides of the river, allowing passage.
